entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 late in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
